trans-unit.source: Configures the <see langword="caching" /> group within a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: 对配置文件中的 <see langword="caching" /> 组进行配置。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup> class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `caching` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup> 类提供一种以编程方式访问和修改配置文件的 `caching` 节的方法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup> class and the `caching` section provide centralized control of the caching mechanism for a site or application.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup>类和`caching`部分提供集中的控制站点或应用程序的缓存机制。

trans-unit.source: This makes it possible for caching to be deployed, modified, and disabled without modifying individual pages in the application.
trans-unit.target: 这使得可能进行缓存以便部署、 修改和禁用而无需修改应用程序中的各个页。

trans-unit.source: The ASP.NET caching mechanism is implemented by the <xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 缓存机制实现的<xref:System.Web.Caching.Cache>类。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET 缓存概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the two types of caching ASP.NET provides.
trans-unit.target: 以下列表介绍的两种类型的缓存 ASP.NET 提供。

trans-unit.source: The first is called output caching, which allows you to store dynamic page and user control responses.
trans-unit.target: 第一种称为输出缓存，这允许你存储动态页和用户控件响应。

trans-unit.source: On subsequent requests, the page or user control code is not executed; the cached output is used to satisfy the request.
trans-unit.target: 在后续请求，未执行的页或用户控件代码;缓存的输出用于满足请求。

trans-unit.source: You can access output caching settings using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问使用输出缓存设置<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCache%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.OutputCacheSettings%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The second type of caching is traditional application data caching, which you can use to programmatically store arbitrary objects to server memory so your application can save the time and resources it takes to recreate them.
trans-unit.target: 第二个类型的缓存是传统的应用程序数据缓存，可以用于以编程方式存储任意对象与服务器内存，以便你的应用程序可以节省时间和资源所需重新创建它们。

trans-unit.source: You can access these cache settings using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 你可以访问这些缓存设置，请使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.Cache%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup> object from the configuration file associated with an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup>从现有的 Web 应用程序与关联的配置文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: You can use this object to access the sections contained in the `caching` group.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用此对象访问中包含的部分`caching`组。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new instance of <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup" />.
trans-unit.target: 创建 <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup" /> 的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup.%23ctor%2A>构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 获取实例<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SystemWebCachingSectionGroup>类通过<xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="cache" /> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置中包含的 <see langword="cache" /> 节。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> object refers to the `cache` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> 对象引用配置文件的 `cache` 节。

trans-unit.source: You can use the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> class to modify the `cache` section programmatically.
trans-unit.target: 你可以使用<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>类来修改`cache`部分以编程方式。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.CacheSection>从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="outputCache" /> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置中包含的 <see langword="outputCache" /> 节。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection> object refers to the `outputCache` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection> 对象引用配置文件的 `outputCache` 节。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSection>从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="outputCacheSettings" /> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置中包含的 <see langword="outputCacheSettings" /> 节。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> object refers to the `outputCacheSettings` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> 对象引用配置文件的 `outputCacheSettings` 节。

trans-unit.source: The output cache settings enable or disable disk-based persistent output cache, define the location for persisting the data to be cached, and specify the maximum size of the cache per application.
trans-unit.target: 输出缓存设置启用或禁用基于磁盘的永久性输出缓存，定义用于永久保存的数据将缓存的位置并指定每个应用程序缓存的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET allows you to cache multiple versions of a page response declaratively by using attributes of the directive and programmatically using the properties and methods of the <xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy> class.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 允许你通过使用特性的指令，以编程方式使用的属性和方法来以声明方式缓存的页面响应多个版本<xref:System.Web.HttpCachePolicy>类。

trans-unit.source: You can achieve the same results by configuring the application using the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> or the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile> type.
trans-unit.target: 你可以配置应用程序使用来实现相同的结果<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>或<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheProfile>类型。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection>从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see langword="sqlCacheDependency" /> section contained within the configuration.
trans-unit.target: 获取配置中包含的 <see langword="sqlCacheDependency" /> 节。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection" /> object.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection> object refers to the `sqlCacheDependency` section of the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection> 对象引用配置文件的 `sqlCacheDependency` 节。

trans-unit.source: The SQL cache dependency establishes a relationship between an item stored in an ASP.NET application's cache and a specific SQL Server database table.
trans-unit.target: SQL 缓存依赖项之间建立关系存储在 ASP.NET 应用程序的缓存和特定的 SQL Server 数据库表中的项。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency> class must monitor the table so that when the table changes the item will be automatically removed from the cache.
trans-unit.target: 实例<xref:System.Web.Caching.SqlCacheDependency>类必须监视表，以便在表发生更改时将从缓存自动移除项。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to obtain the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection> object from the configuration file of an existing Web application.
trans-unit.target: 下面的代码示例演示如何获取<xref:System.Web.Configuration.SqlCacheDependencySection>从现有的 Web 应用程序的配置文件的对象。
